definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: We should take Ronaldo to Lourdes.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該帶羅納爾多去盧爾德。

sentences.english: Ronaldo camped on the left-wing to battle with Ferreira.
sentences.chinese: 羅納爾多打左邊鋒，對壘費雷拉。

sentences.english: I've played against Giggsy, Ronaldo and Nani.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經碰到過吉格斯，羅納爾多和納尼。

sentences.english: Ozil also served an assist to Ronaldo against Atletico Madrid in the Copa del Rey.
sentences.chinese: 厄齊爾同樣在國王杯對陣馬德里競技時助工羅納爾多。

sentences.english: I picked Ronny because he scored a hatful of goals and so many were important.
sentences.chinese: 我會選羅納爾多，因爲他進了太多球，這很重要。

sentences.english: That Ronaldo is utterly essential to Real’s chances is unquestionable.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，羅納爾多對皇馬是不可或缺的。

sentences.english: Owing to his fantastic performance, Ronaldo got the call-up to the full Brazil national squad.
sentences.chinese: 由於羅納爾多的出色表現，他被選入巴西國家足球對。

sentences.english: There's only one Ronaldo, and he is called Christiano.
sentences.chinese: 世上只有一個羅納爾多，他的名字叫做克里斯蒂亞諾。

sentences.english: Brazil coach Dunga has declared AC Milan youngster Alexandre Pato as the 'new Ronaldo'.
sentences.chinese: 巴西主教練鄧加認爲米蘭新星帕託是“新羅納爾多”。

sentences.english: All the evidence points to a case of extortion with Ronaldo as the victim.
sentences.chinese: 所有證據顯示，羅納爾多是這起勒索案的受害者。

sentences.english: Ronaldo has suffered weight problems in the last months after spending more than one year without play due to an injury.
sentences.chinese: 羅納爾多因傷休養了1年多後一直被體重問題困擾。

sentences.english: Ronaldo of Brazil arrived for C45 million.
sentences.chinese: 巴西的羅納爾多用了四百五十萬。

sentences.english: Real Madrid will sign Vieri and Ronaldo in about 80% of your games.
sentences.chinese: 皇家馬德里80%會簽下維耶裏和羅納爾多。

sentences.english: Ronaldo grew up in Bento Ribeiro, a suburb of Rio.
sentences.chinese: 羅納爾多在里約熱內盧的一個叫本託。
